programme.title: Cops Who Kill
programme.desc: Steven Jones: Will Mellor and a team of experts delve into the case of Steven Jones, who tried to use his police knowledge to get away with the murder of his wife Madallin. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Beyond Borders
programme.desc: A Salvadorian murder suspect is tracked down to the streets of New Jersey, while a Cuban businessman suspected of money laundering is apprehended in Tucson. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Dog Patrol
programme.desc: Corrections dog Wally makes a point of finding drugs on prison grounds, while Delta dog Hitch heads upstream in search of a violent offender. (S11, ep 5)

programme.title: Dog Patrol
programme.desc: In Wellington, patrol dog Quita puts the sting on a group of car thieves, while drug hunter Anika makes a stimulating discovery on the Customs mail belt. (S11, ep 6)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Bulletproof Gator: Series following life in the Gold family's pawn shop. The Golds clash when a man brings in an angry pet alligator he wants rid of. Will Les make a bad decision?

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Trouble Inside: Series following life in a huge Detroit pawn shop. One employee shocks the family by turning violent, and Ashley hits the roof when someone tries to sell her dirty knickers.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Series following life in a huge Detroit pawn shop. Staff fight over whether to buy a load of venomous reptiles, and an incident forces Les to seek a new head of security.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Series following life in a huge Detroit pawn shop. Les tells a frightening story of a stick-up at his grandpa's store, and a dominatrix brings her gear into the shop.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The Ninja And The Pitmaster: A stranger on a motorbike raises prices and eyebrows at in DeSoto. With just four lockers up for grabs, the bidding wars are fiercer than ever. (S4, ep 7)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Darth Victor: Jenny squares off against archrivals Ricky and Bubba in order to win her dream locker. Plus, one buyer discovers their dark side on the way to a big victory. (S4, ep 6)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Mayor Of Money Town: Victor gets more than he bargained for when he pursues a motorcycle in Carrollton. Ricky finds himself face to face with one of his biggest fears. (S4, ep 5)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Bronze Beauty: The auction action moves to the tiny town of Pantego, Texas, where one pair of buyers strikes gold with a curious wooden box. (S4, ep 4)

programme.title: Mysteries From Above
programme.desc: The Planet Unlocked: The Pyramids of Giza could be a map of the stars. First responders bring hope during Hurricane Katrina. An Indonesian volcano erupts in a shade of blue. (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: Mysteries From Above
programme.desc: Out of Place: Discover strange aquatic mammals populating a river in Columbia, a ship marooned in sand along Namibia's Skeleton Coast and a Boeing 727 in a pine forest. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: Mysteries From Above
programme.desc: Disaster From Above: Malta loses a natural treasure, an enormous fiery vortex is seen in California and a mysterious radioactive hotspot is found near Chernobyl. (S2, ep 2)

programme.title: Mysteries From Above
programme.desc: Ocean Mysteries: Discover an underwater find from a violent past, a mysterious concrete 'ghost island' and never-before-seen tracks along the seabed. (S2, ep 4)

programme.title: Mysteries From Above
programme.desc: Behind the Myths: Reveal the truth behind ancient legends. Tour an island covered in polar bears, see bizarre twin craters and examine an ocean formation similar to Atlantis. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: Mysteries From Above
programme.desc: Mysterious Monuments: Walk along ancient pathways on Easter Island and discover designs carved into Asia's Eastern Steppe as you explore the planet's most puzzling structures. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: Mysteries From Above
programme.desc: A Whole Lot of Holes: Explore some of the most cavernous places on the planet, including a mysterious Siberian crater and Greenland's bizarre black holes. (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Boston's Bad Blood: Brandon returns to Boston and squares off against his former protégé, Wade, before a military hero goes all in on a locker hiding the ultimate score. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Score of the Century: The score of a lifetime is hidden in the back of a locker, but when the bidding heats up, will our auction heroes have the cash to stay in the game? (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Cash Dash: A smelly bin scares away most bidders, but it ends up being a great score. Plus, Brandon and Lori win a scary bin that may or may not have value. (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Medieval Melee: Buyers haggle over a locker filled with vintage surfing gear, while Brandon and Lori get a busted bin containing a case filled with a strange goo. (S1, ep 11)

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Dirty Deeds, Dirtier Dealings: In San Diego, Brandon and Lori try to stick the Taylor brothers with a questionable vault - but it may just end up biting them in the rear. (S1, ep 12)

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Dirty Gold Rush: The buyers lock horns to win a unit packed with valuable construction equipment, before Brandon and Lori spot something that no one else sees. (S1, ep 13)

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Native Wars: Minds are blown when two buyers team up for a major score. It's an unlikely pair that, together, could make a pile of cash. (S1, ep 14)

programme.title: Storage Hunters
programme.desc: Smoking Hot: Brandon and Jesse lock horns in a bidding war. One of them spies an authentic treasure hidden among the contents, but only one will walk away with the score. (S1, ep 15)

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Tumbleweeds and UAPs: Andy and Paul investigate a remote California desert, where local lore speaks of an entity called Goldie - and they find scientific evidence. (S2, ep 6)

programme.title: Curse Of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Behind the Gates - Going In and Out: Matty Blake delves deeper into the shocking moment the team witnessed an unidentified aerial phenomenon entering and exiting a rocky mesa.

programme.title: Curse Of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Behind the Gates - Simply the Beast: Dr Travis Taylor highlights a legend about Skinwalker Ranch, recounting the shocking evidence which could prove it to be true.

programme.title: New: Ancient Superstructures
programme.desc: Tikal: Discover Tikal, one of the largest and most powerful archaeological sites and urban centers of pre-Columbian Mayan civilisation. (S3, ep 3)

programme.title: New: Pompeii: The Last Mysteries Reveale
programme.desc: Enjoy a journey through time, joining archaeologists as they tread new ground and search for new secrets in one of the world's most fascinating places - Pompeii. (1 of 2)

programme.title: Lost Relic Hunters
programme.desc: Pilgrim Warriors: Hamilton White and Carl Cookson are back on the trail of some truly astonishing relics in season two. (4 of 5)

programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner
programme.desc: Amazing Survival: Incredible stories of people who cheated death, including a man who escaped from the avalanche of debris caused by the collapse of the World Trade Center.

programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner
programme.desc: Man Beasts: We're all fascinated by mysteries. But is the unexplained really unexplainable? William Shatner investigates in an attempt to find a logical explanation. (S3, ep 2)

programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner
programme.desc: Man Beasts: We're all fascinated by mysteries. But is the unexplained really unexplainable? William Shatner investigates in an attempt to find a logical explanation. (S3, ep 2)

programme.title: National Park Mysteries
programme.desc: Great Sand Dunes National Park: A stroll through Great Sand Dunes National Park, where strange lights, animal mutilations and other bizarre incidents have been spotted. (S2, ep 9)

programme.title: National Park Mysteries
programme.desc: Lassen Volcanic National Park: Reports of sightings here include reptiles - known as reptoids - who work with aliens and can appear in human form. (S2, ep 10)

programme.title: Encounter: UFO
programme.desc: These are the witnesses that have been literally touched by the unknown. Do these cases hold the answer to the central question of UFOlogy? (S1, ep 8)

programme.desc: Someone leaves Lynn's Table a bad review online in 'Much Ado About Noshing', then in 'Broadcast Blues', the Action News Team has to cater to Chandler's demands after he buys new equipment. (S5, ep 17)

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod mawr i Bobo heddiw: diwrnod dysgu marchogaeth. It's a big day for Bobo today - learning to ride day!

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Heddiw ar Newffion Alaw gydag adroddiad ar agoriad swyddogol gardd synhwyrau Ysgol Llanilar. Today on Newffion Alaw reports on the official opening of Ysgol Llanilar's sensory garden.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Mae nifer o greaduriaid yn byw yn y pwll cerrig, ac mae gan Seren rwyd i'w gweld yn well! Lots of creatures live in the rockpool, and Seren has a net so she can see them better!

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Betsan yn mynd ar antur i Fferm Fach i weld sut mae moron yn cael eu tyfu gyda Hywel y ffermwr hud. Betsan goes on an adventure to Fferm Fach to learn more about how carrots are grown.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Huwcyn wedi adeiladu drysfa tylwyth teg rhyfeddol! When his friends get lost in the maze, will Huwcyn be able to guide them out again?

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae Ceris yn holi 'Pam bod cathod yn mynd allan yn y nos?'. Mae ateb Tad-cu'n ddwl ac yn ddoniol. Today, Ceris asks Tad-cu 'Why do cats go out at night?'.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Mae Meleri a'r criw yn chwilio am micro-blastigau ar draeth Amroth ac ma criw o ddisgyblion Ysgol Penboyr wrthi'n garddio. Huw joins Nanw and Gwenno on their favourite Menai Strait walk.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Pam fod awyr Ocido wedi troi mor goch? Gyda chymorth Sim, Sam a Swn mae'r ffrindiau'n mynd ar daith yn y roced i gael yr ateb. Why has the sky in Ocido turned so red? The friends find out...

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Mae Ben Dant ar antur newydd i ailgylchu - i droi sbwriel yn sbeshal a gwastraff yn gampwaith. Ben Dant joins the pupils of Ysgol Dyffryn Trannon, Trefeglwys to create a superb treasure.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Pan aiff Dan i chwilio am Pigog yn y Coed Gwyllt heb ei sbectol ma'r gwencïod yn chwarae tric arno ac mae'n syrthio mewn i ffos efo Pigog. The weasels play a nasty trick on Mole.

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Mae hi'n amser gwely, ond mae Deian a Loli'n cael lot gormod o hwyl yn chwarae triciau yn lle. It's bedtime, but Deian and Loli are having way too much fun playing tricks instead.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae Twrchelo yn beirniadu cystadleuaeth arlunio ac mae Dorti wedi penderfynu cystadlu gan ei bod yn hoff o beintio. Twrchelo judges an art competition and Dorti has decided to compete.

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai as they search for a new shell for Cranc !

programme.title: New: Penblwyddi Cyw
programme.desc: Os wyt ti'n dathlu dy ben-blwydd, dyma gyfle i ti weld dy lun ar Cyw. If you're celebrating your birthday, you may be lucky enough to see your photo on today's Cyw!

programme.title: Y Cosmos
programme.desc: Mae'r daith drwy'r Cosmos yn parhau, wrth i ni gyrraedd y Blaned Sadwrn. The ringed planet, Saturn, and exciting evidence which seems to suggest alien life here may have already been found.

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd. Mae Meinir a Sioned yng Ngorslas gyda Adam Jones, sy'n ymuno â thîm cyflwyno'r gyfres eleni. New series: Visiting the Kew Gardens Orchid Festival & native daffodils at Conwy.

programme.title: Priodas Pum Mil
programme.desc: Tro ma: cawn helpu teulu a ffrindiau Jack a Silvia o Lanfrothen, y ddau'n awyddus i gael priodas sy'n ofalgar i'r amgylchedd. We meet a couple who are keen to have an eco-friendly wedding.

programme.title: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: Dathlwn Sul y Blodau gan ddysgu am draddodiadau Cymreig yr wyl. We celebrate Palm Sunday in Montgomeryshire; hymns from Capel y Tabernacl, Llanfyllin, and a performance by Siwan Henderson.

programme.title: Ty Ffit
programme.desc: Penwythnos olaf Dylan, Sharon, Arwel, Gwawr a Becky yn hafan ymlaciol Ty Ffit ac mae tasg olaf heriol o'u blaenau. It's the last weekend for the crew, and there's a challenging task ahead.

programme.title: Pen Llyn Harri Parri
programme.desc: Bydd Harri Parri'n darganfod rhai o straeon trafnidiaeth Pen Llyn. Harri Parri relives his travels in an old Austin Seven and roams Pen Llyn to discover the area's transport history.

programme.title: Pen Llyn Harri Parri
programme.desc: Bydd Harri yn olrhain hanes crefydd Pen Llyn sy'n llawn straeon lliwgar am bobl sydd wedi torri cwys eu hunain. Harri looks at the religious history of the Llyn Peninsula.

programme.title: Sopranos: Y Pasg
programme.desc: Elin Manahan Thomas sy'n canu ei hoff ganeuon crefyddol mewn rhaglen arbennig i ddathlu'r Pasg. Elin Manahan Thomas sings her favourite religious songs for this special Easter programme.

programme.title: Gwladfa: Gwilym Bowen Rhys
programme.desc: Fersiwn ffilm o'r rhaglen deithio lle mae'r cerddor Gwilym Bowen Rhys yn ymweld â'r Wladfa ym Mhatagonia. Film of the travelogue in which musician Gwilym Bowen Rhys travels to Patagonia.

programme.title: Cefn Gwlad
programme.desc: Cwrddwn ag Osian Morris, Dolgellau, dyn ei filltir sgwar sy' wrth ei fodd yn yr awyr agored. We meet Osian, who's hobbies include traditional stone-walling, beekeeping & playing the banjo.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm Omnibws
programme.desc: Rhifyn omnibws yn edrych nôl ar ddigwyddiadau yn Cwmderi dros yr wythnos ddiwethaf. Omnibus edition looking back at events in Cwmderi over the past week. With on-screen English subtitles.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: New: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: Dathlu'r Pasg yn Llyn ac Eifionydd - canu o Gapel y Traeth, Cricieth a perfformiadau gan Mared Williams, Arfon Wyn & ensemble lleisiol Glanaethwy. We celebrate Easter in Llyn ac Eifionydd.

programme.title: New: Cynefin
programme.desc: Trip i'r Barri, un o'n cyrchfannau glan môr mwyaf poblogaidd gyda straeon a chyfrinachau annisgwyl yn cuddio yma. This time, Heledd, Iestyn & Llinos visit Barry town and surrounding area.

programme.title: New: Bariau
programme.desc: Ail gyfres. Mae cyflenwad newydd o gyffuriau yn achosi cur pen i Barry. Dyw dulliau rheoli Simon yn plesio neb. Second series. A new supply of drugs gives Barry a headache.

programme.title: Troseddau Cymru Gyda Sian Lloyd
programme.desc: Stori anghygoel Noel Jones, y dyn gafodd fai ar gam am ladd Janet Commins a hanes yr ymchwiliad aeth o le. The incredible story of Noel Jones, falsely accused of Janet Commins' mansalughter.

programme.title: 3 Lle: Sean Fletcher
programme.desc: Awn i Ysgol Widford Lodge, Penrhyn Gwyr a Llundain yng nghwmni Sean Fletcher o Good Morning Britain. TV presenter Sean Fletcher revisits Widford Lodge School, Tor Bay in the Gower & London.

programme.title: Welsh Whisperer: Ni'n Teithio Nawr
programme.desc: Pentref Llanrhaeadr, Sir Ddinbych sy'n cael y sylw yr wythnos hon, a dechreuwn gyda Phillip Williams, sy'n esbonio dryswch enw'r pentre! This week, a jolly trip to Llanrhaeadr, Denbighshire.

programme.desc: Ceir Cwl. Yn y bennod yma byddwn yn dysgu am bopeth sy'n ymwneud â cheir, ac ewn i Unol Daleithiau America i ddysgu am Henry Ford. In this episode we'll learn about cars.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau'n cael cystadleuaeth cerdded mynydd. On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are having a mountain hiking competition!

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Ar y Newffion heddiw byddwn ni'n clywed mwy am drychfilod ymhob rhan o Gymru. A beast has been seen roaming around Bala - this, and some more Welsh children's news in Newffion Ni.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Beth yw siâp y gragen sydd gan y Capten? Siâp côn! Beth arall sy'n siâp côn? Corned hufen iâ! What shape is the seashell? A cone! And what else comes in a cone? An ice cream, woohoo!

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Mae Stiw ac Elsi'n chwilio am y Gwningen Basg sydd wedi gadael wyau Pasg iddyn nhw yn yr ardd. Stiw and Elsi decide to go looking for the Easter Bunny

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Mae Llew wedi cau'r caffi a mynd i'r jyngl i weld ei ffrindiau ond mae wedi drysu'r diwrnodau! Llew closes the café and sets off to the jungle to meet his friends but he's got the day wrong.

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Meleri a'r criw yn ymweld a Gwenyn Gruffydd, a bydd rhai o ddisgyblion Ysgol Tyle'r Ynn yn cael gwers feicio. Huw explores a special path with members from Clwb Gwerin y Coed.

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Cân draddodiadol am antur Deryn y Bwn o Fannau Brycheiniog wrth iddo fynd ar ei wyliau. This Welsh song follows the adventures of a Bitten Bird from the Brecon Beacons as he goes on holiday.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae Twrchelo yn beirniadu cystadleuaeth arlunio ac mae Dorti wedi penderfynu cystadlu gan ei bod yn hoff o beintio. Twrchelo judges an art competition and Dorti has decided to compete.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Pan mae Toad yn cael gwared ar hen gadair esmwyth, mae'n difaru ar unwaith. The Weasels have claimed Toad's old chair - can he get it back?

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus sy'n llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai on a magical and playful adventure.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Pan mae Teifi a Clustiog yn cael eu dal ar ynys gan hud hen fôr-leidr, all y cwn eu hachub? Teifi and Clustiog are trapped on a faraway island by an old pirate's magic: pups to the rescue!

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae Harmoni, Melodi a Bop yn darganfod holl gemau'r cae chwarae. Mae nhw hefyd yn chwarae mewn rhywbeth meddal, ond beth? Harmony, Melody & Bop discover all the different games you can play

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Mae Betsan yn froga anarferol iawn - nid yw'n gallu nofio. Tybed sut ddysgith hi? Betsan is a very unusual frog - she can't swim. So how is she ever going to learn?

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Rhaid i'r Pawenlu ddarganfod daint coll Aled cyn i Dylwythen y Dannedd gyrraedd! Aled loses his first tooth, then really loses it. The tooth must be located before the Tooth Fairy comes!

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Pan aiff Dan i chwilio am Pigog yn y Coed Gwyllt heb ei sbectol ma'r gwencïod yn chwarae tric arno ac mae'n syrthio mewn i ffos efo Pigog. The weasels play a nasty trick on Mole.

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd â sawl ci bach ac Enfys a'i moch cwta.Today we meet some cute puppies and Enfys and her guinea pigs.

programme.title: Brethyn a Fflwff
programme.desc: Mae 'na bry yn y den! Mae Fflwff yn ei ddilyn yn eiddgar a wneith dim byd yn ei rwystro - dodrefn, silffoedd uchel, neu hyd yn oed Brethyn! Fluff is in hot pursuit of a fly in the den!

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Ma helynt yng Nghwmtwrch pan ma teclyn hirsgwar efo pwerau hudol yn disgyn o'r Pridd Uwchben. It's chaos in Cwmtwrch when a rectangular device with magic powers drops from the Earth Above.

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Bela wrth ei bodd yn garddio ac yn falch tu hwnt o'i blodau lliwgar. Pan aiff rhai ar goll, mae'n gwybod pwy sydd ar fai - Anni! Bella's colourful flowers go missing - who's to blame?

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Co' Bach yn llwyddo i feddu ar bwer y Jet-faneg. Ond, drwy lwc, nid o ddyfeisiadau y daw gwir bwer - ond o'r galon. Co' Bach manages to possess the power of the Jet-glove.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Rhyd y Grug sy'n ymuno â Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Rhyd y Grug join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Dan Do
programme.desc: Yn y rhaglen hon byddwn yn ymweld â thy Edwardaidd gydag estyniad modern yn Wdig. In this programme we'll be featuring an Edwardian house with a contemporary extension in Wdig.

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Ty Am Ddim
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd sy'n rhoi ty am ddim i ddau berson i'w adnewyddu am 6 mis. This time, two teachers learn skills and make friends while renovating a house in Llandrillo yn Rhos.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Prynhawn Da
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Iaith ar Daith
programme.desc: Yr actores Kimberly Nixon sy'n mynd â'r Iaith Ar Daith gyda help yr actor Matthew Gravelle. The actor Kimberly Nixon attempts to learn Welsh with the help of fellow actor Matthew Gravelle.

programme.title: Timpo
programme.desc: Car rmawr Po yn sownd: Mae Car mawr newydd Tîm Po mor fawr fel na wnaiff fynd i fewn i'r Garej! Team Po's new Mega-Truck is so mega-high-up it doesn't fit under the garage door!

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd â Deiniol y cocatw, ac Ifan a'i gi. Today we meet Deiniol the cockatoo, and Ifan and his dog.

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Anni a Cai'n penderfynu chwarae cuddio. Ond mae Cai a Bochau'n methu dod o hyd i Anni, ydy hi'n creu annibendod yn rhywle? Anni and Cai decide to play hide and seek, but there's chaos!

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Crawc yn falch iawn o'i hamog newydd ond yn gwrthod gadael i'w ffrindiau gael tro ynddo. Toad shows off his new hammock but refuses to let anyone else have a nap in it.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Dewch ar daith o gwmpas y byd! Beth am deithio i'r ynys werdd, sef Iwerddon? This time we visit both the Republic of Ireland and Northern Ireland to learn more about the cultures.

programme.title: Y Doniolis
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, mae'r Doniolis yn ymweld â choedwig Cwm Doniol i geisio ennill cystadleuaeth nabod adar gwyllt. This time, the Doniolis visit Cwm Doniol forest to try to win a competition.

programme.title: Larfa
programme.desc: Mae'r criw dwl yn cael hwyl gyda pheipen! The crazy crew have fun with a pipe!

programme.title: New: LEGO® DREAMZzz
programme.desc: I drio torri swyn Beth Bythoedd ac achub y Byd Breuddwydion mae'r Cwsgarwyr yn troi atgof gwaethaf Beth yn ei herbyn. The dream chasers turn Beth Bythoedd's worst memory against her - why?

programme.title: Mabinogiogi a Mwy
programme.desc: Fersiwn Stwnsh o chwedl ci enwocaf Cymru, Gelert, gyda lot o fwythau, mynd am dro, a chyfarth. Join Stwnsh for their take on the tale (not tail) of Wales's most famous dog, Gelert.

programme.title: Y Tyrchwyr gyda Iolo Williams
programme.desc: Bydd Iolo Williams yn ffarwelio â'r mamaliaid ac yn crynhoi'r hyn rydyn ni wedi'i ddysgu wrth sbecian yn eu cartrefi ffug. Iolo Williams bids farewell to the mammals living in the burrows.

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Mae gofid Lowri yn cynyddu, ond gyda chefnogaeth parod Dani ac ysbrydoliaeth gan Mia mae ganddi gynllun sy'n codi ei chalon yn arw. Philip continues to try to hide his financial problems.

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Colleen Ramsey: Bywyd a Bwyd
programme.desc: Yn yr ail raglen cawn weld pa fath o fwydydd mae Colleen a'u theulu yn mwynhau ar y penwythnos. In the second programme Colleen shows us what kind of foods her family enjoy on the weekend.

programme.title: New: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae 'na ymwelydd yng ngardd Adam yng Ngorslas, ac fe fydd digonedd o gyngor am blannu tatws! Over in Ruthin Sioned celebrates Easter with a Spring bouquet, and Meinir creates a bog garden.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Cefn Gwlad
programme.desc: Cwrdd â chymeriadau cwmni busnes cymunedol pentref Pisgah, Aberystwyth sy'n casglu a gwasgu afalau lleol er mwyn gwerthu seidr Pisgah Chi. We visit Aberystwyth's Pisgah Chi cider company.

programme.title: Sgorio
programme.desc: Cyfres llawn cyffro pêl-droed y pyramid Cymreig. Cymru Premier JD highlights, as Barry Town United host Briton Ferry Llansawel in the Bottom Six on the last weekend of the regular season.

programme.title: Gwesty Aduniad
programme.desc: Aduniad dau frawd wedi eu magu yng nghartref plant Bontnewydd wedi 30+ ml ar wahan. Ben and Cadi and their mums Eleri and Jos reunite after time together in the special care unit for babies.

programme.title: Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde
programme.desc: 1980. Horror. Director: Alastair Reid. Stars David Hemmings, Lisa Harrow & Diana Dors. Dr Henry Jekyll experiments on his own personality, resulting in a terrifying struggle between good and evil. [S]

programme.title: The Blob
programme.desc: 1958. Sci fi. Directed by Irvin S. Yeaworth Jr. Stars Steve McQueen, Aneta Corsaut & Earl Rowe. Teenagers Steve and Jane attempt to save their town from a gelatinous creature from another planet. [S]

programme.title: Invasion of the Bee Girls
programme.desc: 1973. Sci-Fi Horror. Starring William Smith, Anitra Ford, Victoria Vetri. A cosmic force is turning earth girls into queen bees who 'love' their men to death.

programme.title: Randle & All That
programme.desc: Comedy short with Ernest Arnley, Gloria Day, Donovan and Frank Randle. Donovan and Byl perform comic acrobatics, Arnley and Gloria do a dance routine and Frank Randle plays an elderly shoe repairer.

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Appleby Fair and Private Rivers. 1980. A display of vintage farm machinery is found at the annual Appleby Fair. Jack Hargreaves goes fly-fishing on a Dorset chalk stream owned by Greg Lake. [S]

programme.title: Once A Sinner
programme.desc: 1950. Drama. A lowly bank clerk marries a good time girl but she two-times him for her old crooked boyfriend (Sydney Tafler). Starring Jack Watling, Pat Kirkwood and Thora Hird. [S]

programme.title: The Greed of William Hart
programme.desc: 1948. Horror. Directed by Oswald Mitchell and screenplay by John Gilling. Set in Edinburgh in the 1800s and starring Tod Slaughter as William Hart the infamous body broker. [S]

programme.title: Master Spy
programme.desc: 1964. Drama. Directed By Montgomery Tully. Starring Stephen Murray. A Russian scientist working for the British is suspected of being a 'plant', sent to monitor nuclear secrets for the Communists. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Pygmalion and Elly. 1962. Stars Irene Ryan, Louis Nye & Donna Douglas. Sonny decides he needs to change Elly into a woman of society, while Granny uses love charms to heat up their relationship. [S]

programme.title: Stagecoach
programme.desc: 1966. Western. Directed by Gordon Douglas. Stars Van Heflin, Stefanie Powers & Bing Crosby. On the stagecoach to Cheyenne, a group of passengers must work together to survive the arduous journey. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: An Egg Grows in Gotham. 1966. Stars Adam West, Vincent Price & Edward Everett Horton. Egghead and his yeggs steal the Gotham City charter in a twisted plot to gain control of the city. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life On the Scent
programme.desc: 1967. A magnificent glimpse into the perfume and fragrance industry, with a look at how perfumes and scents are being used more and more in everyday life.

programme.title: Alice in Wonderland
programme.desc: 1966. Fantasy. Directed by Jonathan Miller. Stars Anne-Marie Mallik, Peter Sellers & Wilfrid Brambell. Young girl Alice falls down a rabbit hole into a bizarre world full of eccentric characters. [S]

programme.title: Where Strangers Meet
programme.desc: 1951. A magnificent travelogue about Soho, featuring the streets, businesses and people you would find in this area of London in the 1950s.

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.desc: The Debt. 1960. Stars Richard Greene & Brian Rawlinson. A foreigner poses as one of Robin's outlaws and robs several people. When Robin learns the man's identity he realises he owes him a debt. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Appleby Fair/Ramming Time. 1986. The annual Romany horse fair in the Eden Valley and a sheep farm in the South Downs are the subjects of two more films from Jack's country diary. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: We watch the lost films from the Ovaltine factory's heyday, and we have a special guest with some rare items. The Easter Bunny is here! And we have a reel of England's 'rebirth' after the war. [S]

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: The Sign of Four
programme.desc: 1987. Thriller. Director: Peter Hammond. Stars Jeremy Brett, Edward Hardwicke, Jenny Seagrove. A young lady contacts Sherlock Holmes for his help regarding her father who disappeared 10 years ago. [S]

programme.title: Gideon's Way
programme.desc: Fall High, Fall Hard. Stars John Gregson Alexander Davion and Daphne Anderson. There is corruption and murderous cover up in the building industry by the co-owner of the building company. [S]

programme.title: The Wheeltappers and Shunters Social Club
programme.desc: Episode 21. 1975. Kenny Ball sings 'So Do I', Cool Breeze perform 'Reach Out Your Hand', Howard Keel performs 'No Business Like Showbusiness' and 'Oh What A Beautiful Morning'. [S]

programme.title: Budgie
programme.desc: Fiddler on The Hoof - Part 1. Stars: Adam Faith, Iain Cuthbertson & Lynn Dalby. Two-part episode in which Budgie's domestic difficulties are complicated by his dad. [S]

programme.title: Ten Little Indians
programme.desc: 1965. Mystery. Directed by George Pollock. Stars Hugh O'Brian and Shirley Eaton. Film version of Agatha Christie's novel. Strangers invited to a party at a mansion each expecting entertainment. [S]

programme.title: The Heritage Chart Show with Mike Read
programme.desc: A TOTP style TV Show for Heritage Artists based on the Heritage Chart which is voted on in over 80 countries. Songs you love from popular artists, live and on video with the odd interview.

programme.title: The Heritage Chart Show with Mike Read
programme.desc: A TOTP style TV Show for Heritage Artists based on the Heritage Chart which is voted on in over 80 countries. Songs you love from popular artists, live and on video with the odd interview.

programme.title: Double X
programme.desc: 1992. Crime drama with Bernard Hill and Norman Wisdom. Former petty thief and safecracker Arthur is the 'brains' behind 'The Organisation' but he wants out. [S]

programme.title: A Good Read with Mike Read
programme.desc: Gentlemen and Players. Immerse yourself in the next classic story, where Raffles and Bunny Manders are invited to play in a country house cricket match, but there is more to it than meets the eye.

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: A Race for Life. 1959. Stars Rory Calhoun, Bart Braverman & Frank Ferguson. A crooked gambler attempts to rig a horse race by using a rattlesnake. [S]

programme.title: The Larkins
programme.desc: Darts and Flowers. 1963. Stars Peggy Mount, Victor Maddern & Edward Malin. Alf arranges a friendly darts match, but he's forgotten that it's on the same day as his wedding anniversary. [S]

programme.title: Fighting Mad
programme.desc: 1957. Drama. Muscles Tanner (Joe Robinson), a boxer, gives up the ring after two fatalities and emigrates to Canada and gets involved with two crooked lumbermen. [S]

programme.title: Shadow of Fear
programme.desc: 1963. Crime drama directed by Ernest Morris and starring Paul Maxwell, Clare Owen and Anita West. Waiting for his flight home from Baghdad, Bill takes a message from a British secret agent. [S]

programme.title: Blind Spot
programme.desc: 1958. Crime Drama directed by Peter Maxwell. Starring Robert Mackenzie, Michael Caine and Delphi Lawrence. US Officer Adams, blinded during the war, is framed on a diamond-smuggling rap. [S]

programme.title: Our Girl Friday
programme.desc: 1953. Comedy. Director Noel Langley. Stars Joan Collins, George Cole, Kenneth More & Hattie Jacques. A British cast lead this story about a shipwrecked group on a tropical island. [S]

programme.title: Suspected Person
programme.desc: 1942. Drama. Director: Lawrence Huntington. Stars Clifford Evans, Patricia Roc, David Farrar, Robert Beatty, William Hartnell. Two bank robbers try to find their partner, who fled to London. [S]

programme.title: Ghost Town Law
programme.desc: 1942. Western. Directed by Howard Bretherton. Stars Buck Jones, Tim McCoy & Raymond Hatton. When two U.S. marshals are killed, the Rough Riders are sent to a ghost town to hunt down the killers. [S]

programme.title: A Town Like Alice
programme.desc: 1956. Drama. Directed by Jack Lee. Stars Virginia McKenna, Peter Finch & Kenji Takaki. While suffering the hardships of being a prisoner of war, Jean meets and befriends captive Australian Joe. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Garden Party. 1963. Stars Buddy Ebsen, Harriet E. MacGibbon & Sharon Tate. Mrs. Drysdale is having a garden party and accidently 'invites' the Clampetts to attend. [S]

programme.title: Scotland Yard
programme.desc: 1954. Passenger to Tokyo. Director: Ken Hughes. Stars Kenneth Henry, Ken Marshall & Peter Penn. An unusual operation helps track down the killer of a wealthy woman sent to Tokyo in a trunk.

programme.title: Dixon of Dock Green
programme.desc: Domino. 1976. Stars Jack Warner, Sally Faulkner & Michael Stainton. A friendly drink between a dock worker and a yacht owner ends with a gunshot, leading the police to deal with a complex case. [S]

programme.title: Out of Town
programme.desc: Appleby Fair/Ramming Time. 1986. The annual Romany horse fair in the Eden Valley and a sheep farm in the South Downs are the subjects of two more films from Jack's country diary. [S]

programme.title: The Footage Detectives
programme.desc: See you all in the TPTV cinema for some brilliant reels of bygone buses! There's also a glimpse of Soho in the 50s, bin men in the 40s and who remembers Bluebird liquorice and chocolate toffees? [S]

programme.title: Public Eye
programme.desc: Mrs. Podmore's Cat. 1972. Detective & Mystery Drama. Stars Alfred Burke, Jean Kent & Ray Smith. Marker is hired to babysit Mrs Podmore's pet cat, Bertie, but things have a way of turning awkward. [S]

programme.title: Accident
programme.desc: 1967. Drama. Directed by Joseph Losey. Stars Dirk Bogarde, Stanley Baker & Jacqueline Sassard. An Oxford University professor yearns for an affair with his beautiful and enigmatic student Anna. [S]

programme.title: The Snows of Kilimanjaro
programme.desc: 1952. Romance. Directed by Henry King & Roy Ward Baker. Stars Gregory Peck & Susan Hayward. A writer reflects on his life as he lies dying from an infection while on safari near Mount Kilimanjaro. [S]
